name: Denk One
description: Denk One is a medium contrast display sans serif. It was inspired by a hand painted German sign. It has been carefully adjusted to the restrictions of the screen. Despite having display characteristics, Denk One can be used in a wide range of sizes. Latest upgrade from February 2023 expands the Latin script language coverage. To contribute, see github.com/SorkinType/Denk-One .
author: Sorkin Type
